audioText: C'est pire que ce que nous avions prévu pour ce projet important.
question: How is the situation compared to what they had planned?
options: It is worse than what they had planned
It is better than what they had planned
It is exactly as they had planned
It is completely different from their plan
explanation: The text states 'C'est pire que ce que nous avions prévu pour ce projet important' - It is worse than what we had planned for this important project. 'Pire' means worse (comparative of bad), and 'prévu' means planned or expected.
